sqlMap.select: SELECT C.GCC_ORG_CD AS REQUESTDEPTID /* 요청부서ID */ , C.ALL_ORG_NM AS REQUESTDEPTNAME /* 요청부서명 */ FROM TBDCMACM001M A , TBDCMACM002M B , TBCSPIIT006M C WHERE A.DPT_CD = B.DPT_CD AND SUBSTR(B.STND_DPT_CD, 9, 7) = C.GCC_ORG_CD AND A.CNB = #strRqsPenCnb#

SELECT B.GCC_ORG_CD AS RESPONSEORGID /* 수신응답기관ID */ , B.LOWT_ORG_NM AS RESPONSEORGNAME /* 수신응답기관명 */ , B.BAI_ORG_CD AS RESPONSEBAIORGID /* 수신응답감사원기관ID */ , F_ORG_INFO(B.BAI_ORG_CD, '1') AS RESPONSEBAIORGNAME /* 수신응답감사원기관명 */ , A.GCC_ORG_CD AS RESPONSEDEPTID /* 수신응답부서ID */ , A.ALL_ORG_NM AS RESPONSEDEPTNAME /* 수신응답부서명 */ FROM TBCSPIIT006M A , TBCSPIIT006M B WHERE A.GCC_HHT_ORG_CD = B.GCC_ORG_CD AND A.GCC_ORG_CD = #strGccOrgCd#
